TextView.android:text: If you create a new account, check your email and follow the activation link!
If you have an account already, fill in the UID or email and password and click on login. You can lookup the UID in any email we sent you.
Login to modify your username, enable SMS support, change your password, or backup/restore your userlist.
You can freely change you username here. Note that it might take some time until your username will be updated in other uers's userlists.

Delphino Cryptocator allows you to send and receive secure encrypted SMS. Therefore you need to provide your phone number. It is strictly forbidden to enter a wrong phone number here. For your privacy, SMS sending is generally only limited to the users in your userlist.\nTherefore, if you enable the secure SMS option, it is necessary to store your userlist on the server.

You can change you account access password here. Note that if you request to change the password, an activation link is sent to your email address. You need to click on this activation link in order to activate the new password.
You can backup your userlist to the Delphino Cryptocator server and restore it later. Restoring will not clear you current list but append users from your backyp to your current userlist.
